name: cinematographic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to or involving cinematography (= the art and methods of film photography) : He was a pioneer in cinematographic techniques. The narrative is deeply cinematographic in style.
More examplesFewer examplesThe latest project combines her dual passions, for food and cinematographic art.He has managed to combine his cinematographic work with the making of documentaries. In "The Language of Film", he discusses the standard cinematographic techniques we are so used to that we don't even notice them.
